content.text: A rewrite of the Ra Material (The Law of One) in narrative book format. The original material, received by Don Elkins, Carla L. Rueckert, and Jim McCarty between 1981 and 1984, is in question-and-answer format. This project transforms it into continuous prose for easier reading.
**Chuchu** — Direction, editorial decisions, verification of fidelity to the original material.
**Claude Opus 4.5** (Anthropic) — Writing, code, translations. Every chapter emerged from conversation between human and AI.
**Voice**: First person plural, as if Ra were writing directly.
**No explicit attribution**: The teachings are presented as philosophical truth, not as "Ra said that..."
**Fidelity**: The content is 100% from the original material. Only the form changed.

items.contribution: A humble messenger of the Law of One
